argument.name: Result
argument.description: The folder where the .NET Framework v4 DLL files are installed.

page.description: Return the folder where the .net Framework v4 DLL files are installed.
page.discussion: Returns the folder where the primary .NET Framework V4 DLL files in the System and Microsoft namespaces are installed. Supported by System Addins Version 3609 and later. Limitations: For V10.5, only useful in Visual Studio 2010 builds. For V11 and later, no limitations
page.example: dim assy as DotNet::AssemblyReference assy.filename = DotNetPath()+"System.Numerics.dll"

see.ref: Writing Xbasic wrapper classes for .NET classes
